summary: Code launches PhantomJS with necessary configurations for web security, local URL access, and ignores SSL errors to run the 'phantom_server.js' script. This setup allows the server to operate without restrictions on local or remote URLs and bypasses SSL certificate verification.

details.comment: Code launches PhantomJS with necessary configurations for web security, local URL access, and ignores SSL errors to run the 'phantom_server.js' script. This setup allows the server to operate without restrictions on local or remote URLs and bypasses SSL certificate verification.
